feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • SQL Server updating signatures support by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15831
  • Bull queue observability. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15829
  • Misc fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15814
  • Load CSS/image assets without going through middlewares by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15833

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.7.2...3.7.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Test cases for asset API by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15839

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.7.3...3.7.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump tar-fs from 2.1.1 to 2.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15840
  • Add PWA feature to types by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15845

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.7.4...3.7.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Automation side bar by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15781
  • Enable OAuth2 for all users by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15847

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.7.5...3.8.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format the plan type label by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15855
  • Budibase AI in self-host. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15817

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.0...3.8.1
